caption.p: The curative activity of mice treated with cycleanine (compound 1) during established P. berghei infection. After infection of mice for 3 days, cycleanine was administered at both doses of 25 and 50 mg/kg, while water and chloroquine at 5 mg/ml were administered as negative and positive controls, respectively. The parasitemia levels were monitored for a total duration of 4 days (from day 3 to day 7).
